name: Plurk2 Plugin for WordPress
author: Johnson.Wang

sections.description:
Using the service from http://plurk.tw/, you can simply put any public Plurk comments/forums to your blog with [http://www.plurk.com/p/XXXXX].

What’s New

New version 0.2 features from 0.1:

  1. Plurk now is using 6 digits to present a plurk.
  2. Plurk2(http://plurk.tw) provides new styles, now add to control panel for default.
  3. You can set type 1-6 in [http://www.plurk.com/p/XXXXXX:n] in your articel for display other style, such like Acknowledge or Vote style.
sections.installation:
1. Upload plurk2.php to the /wp-content/plugins/plurk2/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
